column3: Latest;Stung Treng: A villager who died after being sent to a hospital in Stung Treng province with stab wounds.------The fatal stabbing happened at a pagoda on the fourth day of Pchum Ben
column9: there was a dance party at the pagoda in Kaing Chham commune. At night
column11: and playing when a fight broke out. ------Villagers saw the incident and went stop the dispute
column12: but a knife was pulled and a man stabbed.------Police have confirmed that a villager named Oeun Phoeun
column17: from the village was arrested and questioned.------The district police officer is investigating other relevant persons involved to file a case to the police chief. ------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%98%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9B%E1%9F%84%E1%9F%87%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%96%E1%9F%81%E1%9E%9B%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%B6%E1%9F%86%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%92%E1%9E%BB%E1%9E%84%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%9F%E2%80%8B/------
